basic.Peptide Name: Pantinin-1 (Non-disulfide-bridged peptide 4.20, NDBP-4.20, Non-disulfide-bridged peptide 5.21, ND
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.23624072]Gram-positive bacteria:S.aureus (MIC=8 μM), B.magaterium (MIC=32 μM), M.luteus (MIC=32 μM ), VRE (MIC=28 μM), MRSA (MIC=14 μM);Gram-negative bacteria:E.coli (MIC=62 μM), P.putida (MIC >87 μM), K.oxytoca (MIC >87 μM), E.cloacae (MIC=76 μM), S.enterica (MIC=72 μM);Fungus:C.tropicalis (MIC=16 μM).
